languages.text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}Дворяне{/d}, спасенные вами в звездной гавани, указали координаты укрытий, в которых могут находиться выжившие аристократы с семьями. Что касается простолюдинов, то спасение их не представляется возможным — мы не можем контролировать толпу, они ворвутся на шаттлы и перегрузят их так, что те не смогут взлететь".

"The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."
languages.original_text: "{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}Дворяне{/d}, спасенные вами в звездной гавани, указали координаты укрытий, в которых могут находиться выжившие аристократы с семьями. Что касается простолюдинов, то спасение их не представляется возможным — мы не можем контролировать толпу, они ворвутся на шаттлы и перегрузят их так, что те не смогут взлететь".

traits.locale_text: "The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

"The nobles you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

languages.text: “您在星港救下的那些{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}贵族{/d}给出了避难所的坐标，我们可以去那里找到幸存的贵族和他们的家人。至于平民，我们没有能力救下这些人。我们根本拦不住人群，他们会一拥而上。到时候穿梭机就会超载，无法起飞。”
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: “您在星港救下的那些贵族给出了避难所的坐标，我们可以去那里找到幸存的贵族和他们的家人。至于平民，我们没有能力救下这些人。我们根本拦不住人群，他们会一拥而上。到时候穿梭机就会超载，无法起飞。”

languages.text: 「スターポートで救出した{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}貴族{/d}から、生き残った貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。庶民については、救うことは不可能です。群衆を制御することはできません。彼らがシャトルに殺到することで過負荷になり、離陸が不可能となるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: 「スターポートで救出した貴族から、生き残った貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。庶民については、救うことは不可能です。群衆を制御することはできません。彼らはシャトルに殺到して過負荷になり、離陸が不可能になるでしょう」
「スターポートで救出した{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}貴族{/d}から、生き残った貴族とその家族がいる避難所の座標を聞いています。庶民については、救うことは不可能です。群衆を制御することはできません。彼らがシャトルに殺到することで過負荷になり、離陸が不可能となるでしょう」

languages.text: "Die {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}Adligen{/d}, die Ihr am Raumhafen gerettet habt, haben uns Koordinaten von Verstecken gegeben, wo sich überlebende Aristokraten und ihre Familien aufhalten. Eine Rettung des gemeinen Volk wird allerdings unmöglich sein – wir können die Massen nicht kontrollieren, die die Shuttles erstürmen und überlasten würden, sodass sie nicht einmal starten könnten."
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: "Die Adligen, die Ihr am Raumhafen gerettet habt, haben uns Koordinaten von Verstecken gegeben, wo sich überlebende Aristokraten und ihre Familien aufhalten. Eine Rettung des gemeinen Volk wird allerdings unmöglich sein – wir können die Massen nicht kontrollieren, die die Shuttles erstürmen und überlasten würden, sodass sie nicht einmal starten könnten."

languages.text: « Les {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} que vous avez secourus à l'astroport nous ont donné les coordonnées d'abris dans lesquels se trouvent des aristocrates et leurs familles. Quant aux gens du peuple, il ne sera hélas pas possible de leur venir en aide. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de contrôler de telles foules. Elles prendraient d'assaut les navettes jusqu'à les surcharger au point de ne plus pouvoir décoller. »
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: « Les nobles que vous avez secourus à l'astroport nous ont donné les coordonnées d'abris dans lesquels se trouvent des aristocrates et leurs familles. Quant aux gens du peuple, il ne sera hélas pas possible de leur venir en aide. Nous ne sommes pas en mesure de contrôler de telles foules. Elles prendraient d'assaut les navettes jusqu'à les surcharger au point de ne plus pouvoir décoller. »

languages.text: «Los {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} que rescató en el puerto estelar nos han dado las coordenadas de refugios en los que podremos encontrar a aristócratas supervivientes y a sus familias. En cuanto al pueblo llano, no será posible salvarlo. No podemos controlar a un número tan elevado de gente; se abalanzarán sobre las lanzaderas y las sobrecargarán, impidiendo que despeguen».
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: «Los nobles que rescató en el puerto estelar nos han dado las coordenadas de refugios en los que podremos encontrar a aristócratas supervivientes y a sus familias. En cuanto al pueblo llano, no será posible salvarlo. No podemos controlar a un número tan elevado de gente; se abalanzarán sobre las lanzaderas y las sobrecargarán, impidiendo que despeguen».

languages.text: "Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}soylular{/d}, hayatta kalan aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz sığınakların koordinatlarını verdiler. Sıradan halka gelince... Onları kurtarmamız mümkün olmaz. Kalabalıkları kontrol edemeyiz, sıkış tıkış mekiklere doluşacaklar ki bu da kalkış yapmayı imkânsız hâle getirir."
languages.original_text: "The {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_StarportNobleSaved}nobles{/d} you rescued at the starport have given the coordinates of shelters where we can find surviving aristocrats and their families. As for the common people, saving them will not be possible — we cannot control the crowds, they will rush onto the shuttles and overload them, making it impossible to take off."

traits.locale_text: "Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız soylular, hayatta kalan aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz barınakların koordinatlarını verdiler. Sıradan halka gelince... Onları kurtarmak mümkün olmayacak. Güruhları kontrol edemeyiz, sıkış tıkış mekiklere doluşacaklar ki bu da kalkış yapmayı imkânsız hâle getirecek."

"Yıldız limanında kurtardığınız soylular, hayatta kalan aristokratları ve ailelerini bulabileceğimiz sığınakların koordinatlarını verdiler. Sıradan halka gelince... Onları kurtarmamız mümkün olmaz. Kalabalıkları kontrol edemeyiz, sıkış tıkış mekiklere doluşacaklar ki bu da kalkış yapmayı imkânsız hâle getirir."
